General.Name: Kenmec Mechanical Engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: Kenmec Mechanical Engineering Co., Ltd. engages in design, machining, manufacturing, and trading of industrial machines and steel angle frames in Taiwan. It is also involved in manufacturing and trading of transfer and robot production lines, flexible manufacturing systems, automatic conveyors, automatic pallet stackers, automatic warehousing equipment, unmanned trucks, and robotic arms, as well as trades in computer and optical communication products and their components. The company imports and exports machinery, hardware, office equipment, and electric machinery. Kenmec Mechanical Engineering Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 69, Ruifang Industrial Park, Taipei, Taiwan
